thread.title: Severe fog disrupts flight operations across Pakistan
thread.title_full: Severe fog disrupts flight operations across Pakistan

title: Severe fog disrupts flight operations across Pakistan
text:
Dense fog in the northern regions of Pakistan has severely disrupted flight operations.
Five flights were diverted to alternate airports, while three were canceled, and 41 flights faced delays due to adverse weather conditions.
Passengers are advised to check updated schedules with their airlines due to ongoing disruptions caused by severe weather conditions.
According to the flight schedule:
- Karachi to Lahore flight PA 401 was canceled.
- Islamabad to Gilgit flights PK 601 and PK 602 were also canceled.
- Kuwait City to Sialkot flight PK 240 was diverted to Lahore.
- Jeddah to Faisalabad flight PK 764 was also redirected to Lahore.
- Two flights from Jeddah to Lahore, SV 738 and FL 587, were landed in Islamabad.
- Dubai to Lahore flight ER 724 was also diverted to Islamabad.
